message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is just too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $10,750?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am still aiming to keep my spending within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,500?
